product_desc:
Give Lively incubates ideas around giving. We're focused on making philanthropy a more active and conscious part of your everyday life -- using the latest technology to create products that solve problems and enhance meaning. We're a new social enterprise, and we're eager to bring aboard people with great ideas, who solve problems, who are driven to a philanthropic mission, and who have the skills to iterate on products with purpose.

Currently, we're working on a iPhone app called Small Token, an increbile new way to send an impactful gift to your friends and family. Share your thanks, congrats, and more through a donation to a non-profit.
high_concept: An incubator of products with purpose
name: Give Lively
